warning.title: Warning
warning.description: Elevated risk signals (e.g., distress/default/covenant breach/restructuring or serious refinancing stress and major liquidity actions). Includes previous critical tier.

watch.title: Watch
watch.description: Early-to-moderate risk signals (e.g., weaker presales/take-up, rising unsold stock, margin pressure, cost escalation, softer guidance). Includes previous warning tier.

info.title: Info
info.description: Neutral monitoring items without clear risk signals (e.g., routine launches, corporate updates, sector commentary).
